name: Golgoil the Steel Seismic Smasher
text: If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Golgoil the Steel Seismic Smasher" once per turn. If your Machine or Illusion monster battles, after damage calculation: You can target 1 monster in your GY or banishment; Special Summon it. If this card is banished from the field: You can Special Summon this card.
